level.heading: ENTITY TRANSACTIONS[COLON] PLAN OF CONVERSION (ยง 17-728)

level.text: In addition to the requirements of Chapter 2 (Entity Transactions) of the Act (D.C. Official Code ยง 29-201.01 et seq. (2011 Repl.)), a registered domestic filing entity or registered foreign filing entity shall be in good standing with the Superintendent before filing its statement of conversion.
